pending.$description: Application status: pending state. Used for projects, plans, or items in pending state. Separate from UI status colors (see status.json).

onTrack.$description: Application status: on track. Used for projects or items progressing as expected.

completed.$description: Application status: completed. Used for finished projects, plans, or items.

minorDisruption.$description: Application status: minor disruption. Used for projects or items with minor issues.

majorDisruption.$description: Application status: major disruption. Used for projects or items with significant issues.

upcoming.$description: Application status: upcoming. Used for future projects, plans, or scheduled items.

discontinued.$description: Application status: discontinued. Used for cancelled or stopped projects/items.
